Text:
Open your eyes and be slightly curious.  You will soon find out that there are 543 files in this torrent.  Look closer and you will see that it is a link to a full listing.

Or you could just dl the torrent itself.  Cannot think of a program that won't let you see the contents of a torrent.

Something tells me you should dl this either way.  Stupidity is a disease that can be cured.  Iacocca once said "The secret of success is hard work.  That's why it will remain a secret".
Did anyone scan this torrent for virii, trojans, worms, etc. I'm usually little sceptic about Anonymous uploaders.

This is the list of books inside http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/3696/list0.jpg
- the image is 1.5MB. I didn't downloaded any, so I don't know if there's trojans around those files, but the list is here :)

and I'm sorry about my bad English
